function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for pandemic requirements in sustainable design of living spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Integrating pandemic-resilient indicators into sustainable design guidelines and certification systems","Technologies":"Building Information Modeling (BIM) for simulating disease spread in living spaces","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors of built environments","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and certification system administrators"},{"Description":"Limited knowledge on how Green Building Certification Systems (GBCSs) address pandemic requirements","Impact":"Ineffective response to pandemic realities and compromised public health","Mitigation":"Conducting systematic assessments and evaluations of GBCSs to identify gaps and prioritize improvements","Technologies":"Data analytics and performance simulation tools for evaluating GBCS responses to pandemic requirements","People":"Researchers, GBCS administrators, and sustainability experts","Owner":"Research institutions, GBCS governing bodies, and sustainability organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty regarding the long-term sustainability impact of the pandemic on built environments","Impact":"Potential regression in sustainable design practices and missed opportunities for permanent improvements","Mitigation":"Developing proactive strategies to integrate pandemic-resilient sustainability practices into long-term building norms","Technologies":"Predictive modeling and scenario planning tools for evaluating the long-term impact of pandemic on built environments","People":"Policy makers, urban developers, and sustainability advocates","Owner":"Government agencies, urban development authorities, and sustainability advocacy groups"}]}
